name: tiny island (Matt W.)
description:
walk around a very tiny island and watch out for mines!

- an entry for the Physics Jam 2021 hosted by Free Lives

(note: this game is very incomplete, not even sure I can call it a game lol)

I had fun making it nonetheless :)

controls
  • wasd keys - move
  • space - dive
